posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/w-purple.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition Four[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Hack Forum News is back this week with another update on the weekly news to keep you up to date on the latest news on site and around the world. If you have never heard of Hack Forum News, dont worry we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journilists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and now even around the world.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=121196]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6302035][color=#ffffff]The Great Purge Day[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
Earlier this week, Omniscient declared "The Great Purge Day," making a bold executive decision to remove a select group of members whom he believes have been damaging his business and driving members away from HackForums. These individuals have been permanently banned, and some have even been completely erased. Omniscient has made it unmistakably clear: cause trouble, and you're out - no exceptions.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6301947][color=#ffffff]Public Convo Closure[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
After receiving multiple reports of doxing and harassment in the public conversation room, Omniscient has decided to remove this feature and close the room entirely, stating that the actions of a few have ruined it for the majority. However, Omniscient has mentioned plans to introduce the ability to create private rooms within the conversation feature.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6301729][color=#ffffff]VIP Group Subforums CSS Changes[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
Omniscient has implemented updates to the VIP Group Subforums, giving them a customized CSS design that now reflects the unique name colors of each group. This change enhances the visual appeal of the subforums, making it easier to distinguish between the different VIP groups at a glance.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6301521][color=#ffffff]New L33T & UB3R Userbar Design[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
As we've highlighted in recent news editions, Omniscient has been implementing various visual changes to give the forum a fresh, updated feel. This week, Omniscient revamped the L33T and UB3R userbars with the assistance of graphic designer Motusora, giving both upgradable user groups a sleek, new look. We think they look fantastic - what do you think? If you're considering upgrading but haven‚Äôt already, you can do so here: https://hackforums.net/upgrade.php

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6302095][color=#ffffff]Bytes Reward Adjustment[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]
This week, Omniscient decided to lower the minimum character requirement for posts to just 5. Following this change, Omniscient also determined that it would be more suitable to adjust the byte reward structure. You will now receive 1 byte as a reward for each reply, down from the previous value of 3.

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/statistics-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/awards-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]
[color=#ffffff]

[b]This week the donation awards page has had a bit of a change. Omniscient has rotated the awards around and a few old classic awards are back up for purchase. If you would like to check out what is new, head over to the donation award page to snipe up some of the awards today.  Or [url=https://hackforums.net/buyawards.php]click here![/url][/b]

[mention=2004303] Has been obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]

[b]Also, a big shout-out to those who managed to grab the new American flag award for Independence Day this year. [award=228]
[/color][/b]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/groups-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

[b][u]GROUPS FOR SALE AND SOLD[/u][/b]

[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6241882]Succubus group[/url] is still listed for sale by [mention=3604010]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6297965]Olympians group[/url] is listed for sale by [mention=1342286]

No recent group sales.

[B][u]RECENT GROUP CHANGES & EVENTS[/u][/B]
[url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6300405]Slots night, $100buy-in, prize pool split among participants, and entry into Gamblers[/url]
Fallen has been rebranded to Fidelity.

The Main Boyz crew has been deleted.

[b][size=large][u]RECRUITMENTS:[/u][/size][/b]

[color=#ffffff][b]This week we had a bit of a mad one. We have sadly seen a few infamous names sadly purge their accounts and we no longer have them around. Due to this, the names can not be tagged as normal. We have also tried our best to mention all notable names due to the purge actions, but sadly, as they have been purged they can all be seen. If we have missed anyone important, feel free to shout them out below.[/b][/color]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/world-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]U.S. Trade Tariff Deadline Approaches (9th Of July)[/color][/size][/b][/u]

President Trump is set to issue new tariff letters‚Äî25% levies to start August‚ÄØ1‚Äîtargeting countries including Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Kazakhstan, and Myanmar. EU and BRICS face steep tariffs unless last-minute trade deals are reached.

[b][url=https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/live/2025/jul/07/donald-trump-elon-musk-new-party-us-politics-live-latest-news]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Devastating Texas Flash Floods[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Central Texas was struck by flash floods over the holiday weekend, claiming at least 82 lives, including 27 at a riverside summer camp and leaving dozens unaccounted for.

[b][url=https://www.wsj.com/articles/whats-news-world-wide-67123a18]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Markets Brace for Trade-Jitter Volatility[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Investors are wary ahead of the tariff deadline, citing risks to industries like European auto manufacturing and disruptions in global supply chains.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/take-five/global-markets-themes-graphic-2025-07-04/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Extreme Heatwave in Europe[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Temperatures soared across Southern Europe, with the Eiffel Tower in Paris closing its summit amid record heat (up to 46‚ÄØ¬∞C in Spain/Portugal and 40‚ÄØ¬∞C in Germany). Mediterranean heatwaves and wildfires are raising alarms.

[b][url=https://www.nowinbrief.com/world-news/top-world-news-today-july-1-2025-global-headlines-heatwaves-and-trade-tensions/]Source[/url][/b]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/gaming-header.png[/img]
[size=medium]Writer -[/size][/align] [mention=811]

[color=#72FF84]Notable console & hardware releases:[/color]

July is a quiet month for major console and hardware releases following the launch of the Nintendo Switch 2 in June. The industry's focus remains on software and adoption of Nintendo's new hardware. There are no major console or  hardware releases announced for July 2025 at this time.

[color=#FF5F54][b]Nintendo Switch‚ÄØ2 restocks:[/b][/color]

Scalpers are still a concern for this console a month later. Released on June 5th, the Switch‚ÄØ2 remains in high demand. Best‚ÄØBuy briefly restocked July‚ÄØ1st in-store, and sold out. U.K. retailers (Amazon, Currys, ShopTo) maintain steadier supply.
Official pricing: $449 base and $499 bundled with Mario Kart World.

[color=#72FF84]Notable News (July 2025)[/color]

[color=#FF5F54][b]Call of Duty Remote Code Execution (RCE) exploit[/b][/color]

[u][i]Highly Vulnerable: Call of Duty: WWII (PC)[/i][/u]

When the publisher, Activision, was aware of this critical vulnerability, PC servers went completely offline for emergency maintenance.
Timeline of the event:

July 2nd - 4th: This is when the community became aware of the issue. People began posting on Reddit and X warning other users that hackers began opening applications like Notepad and harassing players in-game.
July 5th: Activision's official "Call of Duty Updates" account acknowledged they were investigating "an issue" and took the PC version of the game offline.

A specific vulnerability "CVE-2018-20817" affected several older Call of Duty games as well. Hackers could exploit the game's authentication process, and execute code on your machine remotely.

[u][i]Historically Vulnerable and Still Considered Unsafe on PC:[/i][/u]

Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 (2009)
Call of Duty: Black Ops
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
Call of Duty: Black Ops II
Call of Duty: Ghosts
Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered (on official servers)
Call of Duty: Black Ops III (A patch was released in 2023 by Treyarch. Members of the COD community still advise caution and recommend community patches.)


[color=#72FF84]Notable Game Releases (July 2025)[/color]

It is still early in the month of July, but this will be a blockbuster month for gamers. Most AAA titles launch between September and November. Publishers strategically release during the months before to avoid the "Autumn Logjam".

[color=#FF5F54][b]Game Releases - July 2025[/b][/color]

Mecha Break (PC, PS5, Xbox Series X/S) - July 1

üèÜ [color=#72FF84]E-Sports[/color]

[color=#FF5F54][b]üèÜ Winners of most recent E-Sports tournaments: üèÜ[/b][/color]

CS2: BLAST Austin Major: Team Vitality takes the trophy in Austin, TX
Valorant Champions Tour: Paper Rex Paper Rex lifted the trophy at VCT Masters in Toronto, Canada

[color=#FF5F54][b]Ongoing and upcoming E-Sports tournaments:[/b][/color]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Windows 11 overtakes Windows 10 in global desktop OS share[/color][/size][/b][/u]

After roughly four years since its launch, Windows 11 has become the most-used desktop operating system worldwide. Adoption is accelerating as Windows 10 approaches its end-of-support reminder, prompting more upgrades.

[b][url=https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/microsofts-latest-operating-system-claims-majority-market-share-after-nearly-four-years-driven-by-windows-10s-approaching-end-of-support-deadline/articleshow/122304437.cms]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Amazon Prime Day 2025 preview‚Äîhuge tech deals ahead[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Prime Day runs from July‚ÄØ8‚Äì11 this year. Major discounts on electronics, PC hardware, and tech accessories are already starting. Experts recommend eyeing headline tech deals‚Äîthink MacBook Air M4s and noise-cancelling headphones‚Äîwhile holding off on big-tix smart TVs or furniture.

[b][url=https://www.tomshardware.com/news/best-deals-on-tech]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Samsung Galaxy Unpacked coming 9th Of July‚ÄØ[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Samsung‚Äôs summer Unpacked will unveil the Galaxy Z Fold‚ÄØ7, Z Flip‚ÄØ7, Galaxy Watch‚ÄØ8, and more‚Äîpotentially including concepts like a tri-fold phone and Android XR headset. It‚Äôs set for July 9th in New York City.

[b][url=https://www.tomsguide.com/phones/samsung-phones/samsung-unpacked-july-2025-galaxy-z-fold-7-z-flip-7-galaxy-watch-8-and-everything-to-expect]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]AI talent race: Big bucks, big layoffs[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Meta and Microsoft are pouring massive incentives into AI talent acquisitions‚ÄîMeta reportedly offered $100‚ÄØmillion bonuses‚Äîwhile massive layoffs are still rocking the wider tech workforce, with over 250,000 jobs cut in 2023.

[b][url=https://www.thetimes.com/business-money/technology/article/a-few-human-brains-are-the-real-smart-ones-in-the-ai-arms-race-fv9wxnbvk]Source[/url][/b]
[/align]
